West Virginia tells Bernie Sanders and Joe Biden to go fuck themselves.

72 percent of West Virginia voters back Manchin's call to suspend Build Back Better talks: poll

Seventy-two percent of West Virginia voters support Sen. Joe Manchin‚Äôs (http://D-W.Va.) decision to walk away from Democrats' Build Back Better negotiations over concerns about inflation, according to a new poll obtained first by The Hill.

The survey, conducted by Remington Research Group on behalf of the National Association of Wholesaler-Distributors (NAW), a business group that is lobbying lawmakers to abandon the bill, found that 66 percent of voters in key swing states including Nevada and Arizona believe that the $2.2 trillion plan would make inflation worse.

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs clear: Americans are feeling the pressure of inflation, and they want Congress to focus on relief ‚Äî not massive new spending bills that could make inflation worse and stall our economic recovery,‚Äù NAW CEO Eric Hoplin said in a statement.

https://thehill.com/homenews/senate/591678-72-percent-of-wv-voters-back-manchins-decision-to-suspend-build-back-better

_source.content:
Did Xi ask Putin not to steal China's Olympic thunder by invading Ukraine?
By Eric Utter
Online reports citing an anonymous Beijing diplomat have speculated that Chinese president Xi Jinping, during a recent phone call, may have asked Russian president Vladimir Putin not to invade Ukraine during the upcoming Beijing Olympic Games. A Russian attack incursion would steal Xi's thunder and take the spotlight off of his glorious nation's peerless hosting ability, thereby depriving him of the opportunity to showcase the superiority of the Chinese Communist Party. If Putin were to sack Ukraine during the Olympics, it would create a highly negative backdrop for the Olympic Games. In other words, it would be a bummer for Xi.

China's Foreign Ministry highlighted the importance Beijing attaches to the issue at a recent news briefing. It stated that countries should observe a traditional U.N. Olympic truce resolution "from seven days before the start of the Olympic Games until seven days after the end of the Paralympic Games," according to a spokesman.

https://www.americanthinker.com/blog/2022/01/did_xi_ask_putin_not_to_steal_chinas_olympic_thunder_by_invading_ukraine.html

Seguendo Karl Marx, la Scuola sottoline√≤ il fatto che la ¬´personalit√† autoritaria¬ª √® un prodotto della famiglia patriarcale (come abbiamo visto, fu Marx che denigr√≤ l'idea della famiglia come unit√† basilare della societ√†). Tutti ci√≤ prepar√≤ il terreno ad una guerra contro il genere maschile condotta negli anni Sessanta da Herbert Marcuse (1898-1979) sotto le sembianze della ¬´liberazione della donna¬ª e del movimento della nuova sinistra. Essi proposero di trasformare la cultura occidentale in un modello di societ√† dominato dalla donna. Nel 1933, Wilhelm Reich (1897-1957), uno dei membri della Scuola, scrisse nell'opera Psicologia di massa del fascismo che il matriarcato era l'unico tipo di famiglia genuino di una ¬´societ√† naturale¬ª.

Fromm ‚Äì promotore del matriarcato e del femminismo integrale

Anche Eric Fromm era un fautore attivo della teoria matriarcale. La mascolinit√† e la femminilit√†, diceva Fromm, non erano dovuti alle diversit√† sessuali ¬´essenziali¬ª, come avevano pensato i romantici, ma derivavano ¬´dai diversi ruoli nella vita che in parte erano gi√† socialmente determinati¬ª (8). Il suo dogma fu il precedente su cui si fondarono le dichiarazioni delle femministe integrali che, oggi, appaiono su quasi tutti i giornali pi√π conosciuti e in molti programmi televisivi. I rivoluzionari sapevano benissimo quello che volevano fare e come farlo. E ci sono riusciti. (continua‚Ä¶)

Franz√∂sischer Philosoph: Massive demografische Ver√§nderungen in Europa sind ‚Äûoffensichtlich‚Äú

‚ÄûHistorische V√∂lker in bestimmten Gemeinden und Regionen werden zu einer Minderheit‚Äú.

In einer Fernsehdebatte sagte der franz√∂sische Philosoph Alain Finkielkraut, es bed√ºrfe einer ‚Äûfanatischen Realit√§tsverweigerung‚Äú, um die ‚Äûspektakul√§ren‚Äú demografischen Ver√§nderungen, die in Europa stattfinden, zu ignorieren.

Alain Finkielkraut, eines von 40 Mitgliedern auf Lebenszeit der 400 Jahre alten Acad√©mie Fran√ßaise, die sich f√ºr den Schutz der franz√∂sischen Sprache und Kultur einsetzt, √§u√üerte sich w√§hrend eines Auftritts im Fernsehsender Europe 1.

Finkielkraut erkl√§rte, dass Versuche, solche Debatten zu unterbinden, indem man behauptet, die Diskussion √ºber eine ‚Äûgro√üe Abl√∂sung‚Äú sei gef√§hrlich, nur dazu dienen, von einem sehr realen und ‚Äûoffensichtlichen‚Äú Problem abzulenken.

‚ÄûEs handelt sich in der Tat um eine Zersplitterung, und ja, diese Gefahr besteht, und auf jeden Fall halte ich den demografischen Wandel in Europa f√ºr √§u√üerst spektakul√§r. Die historischen V√∂lker in bestimmten Gemeinden und Regionen werden zu einer Minderheit‚Äú, so Finkielkraut. ‚ÄûEin ganzer Teil der Franzosen lebt heute nicht mehr in den Vorst√§dten, sondern au√üerhalb der Vorst√§dte, weil sie nicht mehr die kulturelle Referenz sind, die sie einmal waren, weil alle Metzger zum Beispiel Halal sind‚Äú.

Der Philosoph betonte, dass das Thema ‚Äûmit gro√üer Vorsicht behandelt werden sollte, aber es (als rassistisch) zu verteufeln ist absurd und zeugt einmal mehr von fanatischer Realit√§tsverweigerung‚Äú.

Der lautst√§rkste und freim√ºtigste Kandidat bei den bevorstehenden franz√∂sischen Wahlen, wenn es darum geht, den demografischen Austausch zu betonen, ist der j√ºdische Intellektuelle Eric Zemmour, ein Mann, den Finkielkraut als ‚Äûzu radikal‚Äú bezeichnet.

Zemmour hat gefordert, dass Frankreichs ber√ºchtigte islamische Ghetto-Verbotszonen, die regelm√§√üig Schauplatz von Gewalt und Massenunruhen sind, ‚Äûmit Gewalt zur√ºckerobert‚Äú werden sollten.

In einer Rede warnte Zemmour auch, dass 1,5 Milliarden Afrikaner, die sich auf den Weg nach Europa machen wollen, ‚Äûden Tod Frankreichs‚Äú bedeuten.

‚ÄûIch glaube, die Angst vor dem Ende Frankreichs, wie es war, die Angst vor der gro√üen Abl√∂sung, ist zu einem globalen Gef√ºhl geworden‚Äú, sagte Zemmour im vergangenen Jahr. ‚ÄûDie Angst, nicht mehr Frankreich zu sein, die Angst vor der ber√ºhmten gro√üen Abl√∂sung. Viele Menschen beginnen zu denken, dass der Islam uns ersetzen wird. Es ist ein massives Gef√ºhl geworden, eine Masse von 70 bis 80 Prozent der Franzosen‚Äú.

Eine im April letzten Jahres durchgef√ºhrte Umfrage ergab, dass die Mehrheit der Franzosen eine Art ‚ÄûB√ºrgerkrieg‚Äú als Folge des gescheiterten Multikulturalismus und der Angriffe auf die franz√∂sische Identit√§t f√ºr wahrscheinlich h√§lt.

@a Preach the gospel of repentance from the rooftops! God would have all (hu)men everywhere to repent and believe the gospel of Christ Jesus. Be heralds of Christ just like John the Baptist! He did no signs, had no powers, and did no miracles. PREACH THE WORD!

"Make straight the way of the Lord!"
- preach the word of God.

// // // WARNING! // // //

Don't add to God's word or take away from it!

Tell them how they can know for sure their sins are forgiven because of the finished work of God's perfect spotless lamb, our perfect sacrifice the Lord Jesus Christ who died once - the just for the unjust that He could bring many sons to glory!

Jesus doesn't need re-killing every Sunday by a "priest"...
God doesn't need your traditions, works, or your resources. Sinners need God.

As the lyric goes: "Nothing in my hand I bring, simply to thy cross I cling".

"IT IS FINISHED! Jesus cried it out in a loud voice.
The price it has been paid. Jesus suffered, bled, and died for sins so that sinners wouldn't have to. Will you trust in Him today? Don't insist on paying for God's wrath by doing it your way.

I beg you. Even if you suffered for eternity- it could never pay the debt you owe. Only Christ being God suffered eternally for the sin of those who trust in Him. He is 100% God and 100% man(Emanuel), he alone could bear the cost and offer salvations gift.

Because He is Eternal and exists outside of time- if he ever did something- he always has. So if he ever bore the wrath of your sin- he always has and will. God is the same yesterday, today, and forever.

"That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.
For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: Not of works, lest any man should boast."

Ephesians 2:7-9 KJV

Look and live. Trust God at His word that Christ Jesus walked as a man, died, and was resurrected on the third day according to the scriptures. He did all that for the sake of all who would ever trust in Him by faith.

"Jesus paid it all. All to Him I owe."

Preach it to the world!

"Christ for the world, for the world needs Christ!"- Eric Liddel

‚ÄúWhy was Barr chosen, given his shocking and deeply criminal cover-up kingpin background?
For a presidential administration whose mandate was the eradication of corruption, the ‚Äúdraining of the swamp‚Äù, and the restoration of law?
With the nomination of William Barr for attorney general, that is what President Donald Trump wants American citizens and the world to accept.
Fawning mainstream media coverage, and streams of puff pieces laud Barr as a ‚Äúrespected‚Äù establishment ‚Äúlegal scholar‚Äù, as do Donald Trump‚Äôs Twitter posts about Barr.
The fact is, there is nothing to ‚Äúrespect‚Äù and everything to condemn about Barr‚Äôs work as a key inner circle operative throughout George Herbert Walker Bush‚Äôs rise to power, from CIA Director to Vice President to President. These aspects of Barr‚Äôs resume remain whitewashed by mainstream coverage. They have been amply documented by whistleblowers and those who worked directly with Barr.
The issue at hand is not Barr‚Äôs ‚Äúlegal mind‚Äù, but the ruthless mind that he wielded with frightening authority and expertise as George H. W. Bush‚Äôs treasonous hatchet man in the Justice Department. William Barr distorted and corrupted the law, as grossly as anyone in modern history.
Barr: CIA operative
It is a sobering fact that American presidents (many of whom have been corrupt) have gone out of their way to hire fixers to be their attorney generals.
Consider recent history: Loretta Lynch (2015-2017), Eric Holder (2009-2015), Michael Mukasey (2007-2009), Alberto Gonzales (2005-2007), John Ashcroft (2001-2005),Janet Reno (1993-2001), Dick Thornburgh (1988-1991), Ed Meese (1985-1988), etc.
Barr, however, is a particularly spectacular and sordid case. As George H.W. Bush‚Äôs most notorious insider, and as the AG from 1991 to 1993, Barr wreaked havoc, flaunted the rule of law, and proved himself to be one of the CIA/Deep State‚Äôs greatest and most ruthless champions and protectors:
Barr was a full-time CIA operative, recruited by Langley out of high school, starting in 1971. Barr‚Äôs youth career goal was to head the CIA.
CIA operative assigned to the China directorate, where he became close to powerful CIA operative George H.W. Bush, whose accomplishments already included the CIA/Cuba Bay of Pigs, Asia CIA operations (Vietnam War, Golden Triangle narcotics), Nixon foreign policy (Henry Kissinger), and the Watergate operation.
When George H.W. Bush became CIA Director in 1976, Barr joined the CIA‚Äôs ‚Äúlegal office‚Äù and Bush‚Äôs inner circle, and worked alongside Bush‚Äôs longtime CIA enforcers Theodore ‚ÄúTed‚Äù Shackley, Felix Rodriguez, Thomas Clines, and others, several of whom were likely involved with the Bay of Pigs/John F. Kennedy assassination, and numerous southeast Asian operations, from the Phoenix Program to Golden Triangle narco-trafficking.
